metadata.name: Prince of England
metadata.description:
The boy who barely had food to eat as a kid would go on to feed 3 million children. 

This painting reflects both the childhood struggles of Marcus Rashford MBE and his efforts to put smiles on the faces of millions of children during the COVID-19 pandemic. 

Proceeds generated from the sale of this NFT will be donated to a charity focused on child education in Africa.
